original_text: And he that eateth of the carcase of it shall wash his clothes, and be unclean until the even: he also that beareth the carcase of it shall wash his clothes, and be unclean until the even.
korean_text: 그것을 먹는 자는 그 옷을 빨 것이요 저녁까지 부정할 것이며 그 주검을 옮기는 자도 그의 옷을 빨 것이요 저녁까지 부정하리라

sentences.original_text: And he that eateth of the carcase of it
and be unclean until the even
he also that beareth the carcase of it
and be unclean until the even
